siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Startup benchmark data is fragmented and disorganized, scattered across hundreds of Medium blogs. We are curating the world’s largest library of startup benchmark data, creating market transparency for founders and institutions.
blogPost.body: Startup benchmark data is fragmented and disorganized, scattered across hundreds of Medium blogs. We are curating the world’s largest library of startup benchmark data, creating market transparency for founders and institutions.
blogPost.title: Bluelight - The world’s largest library of startup benchmark data
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 创业公司的基准数据是零散的、无序的，分散在数百个Medium博客中。我们正在策划全球最大的创业公司基准数据库，为创始人和机构创造市场透明度。
localize.tagline: 全球最大的创业标杆数据库。

localize.description: 創業公司的基準數據是零散的、無序的，分散在數百個Medium博客中。我們正在策劃全球最大的創業公司基準數據庫，爲創始人和機構創造市場透明度。
localize.tagline: 全球最大的創業標杆數據庫。

previous.excerpt: They say don't judge a book by its cover... What about movies? uFlix takes movie nights and turns the decision process into an enjoyable social experience to have with friends, family or partners!
previous.title: uFlix - Choose what to watch in a hassle free manner

localize.description: 俗话说，不要以貌取人。uFlix将电影之夜的决定过程转化为与朋友、家人或伴侣一起享受的社交体验！那么电影呢？
localize.tagline: 无忧无虑地选择观看内容。

localize.description: 俗話說，不要以貌取人。uFlix將電影之夜的決定過程轉化爲與朋友、家人或伴侶一起享受的社交體驗！那麼電影呢？
localize.tagline: 無憂無慮地選擇觀看內容。

next.excerpt: https://PlaylistMap.com is the most direct and authentic way to reach new listeners, grow your fanbase, and increase streams and saves. PlaylistMap was built to make this easier.
next.title: PlaylistMap - Connect with Spotify playlist curators from around the world

localize.description: https://PlaylistMap.com 是接触新听众、发展粉丝群、增加流媒体和保存的最直接、最真实的方式。PlaylistMap就是为了让这一切变得更简单而设计的。
localize.tagline: 与来自世界各地的Spotify播放列表策展人联系。

localize.description: https://PlaylistMap.com 是接觸新聽衆、發展粉絲羣、增加流媒體和保存的最直接、最真實的方式。PlaylistMap就是爲了讓這一切變得更簡單而設計的。
localize.tagline: 與來自世界各地的Spotify播放列表策展人聯繫。
